amendment.description: Amendment sought to define specific learning disability to mean a disorder due to a medically detectable and diagnosable physiological condition relying on physical and scientific evidence and not based on subjective evidence.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 108-79 redefines 'specific learning disability' as a disorder due to a medically detectable and diagnosable psychological condition relying on physical and scientific evidence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 54 - 367 (Roll no. 153).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Tancredo.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 54 - 367 (Roll no. 153).
